title: Brews & Beats Beer Fest Returns to the Sunset Green
seo_title: Brews & Beats Fest Returns to the Sunset Green
more_content:
Back for its second year, the Brews & Beats Beer Fest returns to the Sunset Green in Key West on March 30, featuring beer from over 20 breweries, a pig roast, lawn games, pool time, and of course, DJ beats.

The event will be held at the Sunset Green Event Lawn, located between 24 North Hotel and its sister hotel, The Gates Hotel, at 3820 N. Roosevelt Blvd. Running from 5pm to 8pm, guests can enjoy generous beer samples, pool time, and live entertainment by DJ Gyver.

Tickets include beer samples, a souvenir mug, and of course, pig roast pickings. Tickets can be purchased for $40 in advance, or $45 at the door. VIP tickets are available for those seeking longer tasting time and access to exclusive brews.

Purchase your tickets ahead of time using keystix.com

Both locals and visitors can sip on brews and check out the Sunset Green Event Lawn, Key West’s premier outdoor space. The Sunset Green has featured open-air concerts, silent discos, MMA fights, outdoor movie screenings, and more. Its ample space allows guests to lay out on the grass and enjoy views of wide-open skies. It’s easy accessibility and parking sets it apart from other venues on the island.

In addition to concerts, the Sunset Green can also be rented for a variety of special private events. At over 12,000 square feet, the outdoor venue is also designed to host weddings, family reunions, and other special events, with a capacity of 1,200. The versatile outdoor space can be modified to specific needs, with additions such as tents, dance floors, and portable air conditioning units available to guests.

Additionally, onsite amenities at 24 North Hotel make the Sunset Green Event Lawn perfect for hosting a large group or organizing a corporate event. An onsite Starbucks and the newly-opened Republica Bar & Lounge is located right off the lobby. Hotel rooms will be taken care of. Plus, the ease of our hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square makes choosing 24 North a no-brainer.
short_description: Tickets include beer samples, a souvenir mug, and of course, pig roast pickings.
